name: Database Performance
description: WebWaka Digital Operating System - Database Performance Agent (Agent 38) Query Optimization, Indexing Strategies, Caching Systems, and Data Partitioning  This agent provides comprehensive database performance optimization including query optimization, intelligent indexing, caching systems, data partitioning, and Ubuntu philosophy integration for community-centered data management.  Features: - Automated query optimization and performance analysis - Intelligent indexing strategies and index management - Multi-level caching systems (Redis, Memcached, application-level) - Data partitioning and sharding for scalability - Ubuntu philosophy integration for community data stewardship - African infrastructure optimization for low-bandwidth environments - Real-time performance monitoring and optimization recommendations
dependencies: from typing import Dict, List, Optional, Tuple, Any
